title: Netflix tops Disney as most valuable media property
text:
Netflix tops Disney as most valuable media property Thursday, May 24, 2018 - 01:57
Netflix, the steaming movie service once left for dead, has completely won over fans in living rooms and Wall Street, giving the company a bigger stock market value than media and entertainment giants Walt Disney and Comcast. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Netflix, the steaming movie service once left for dead, has completely won over fans in living rooms and Wall Street, giving the company a bigger stock market value than media and entertainment giants Walt Disney and Comcast.
